rules.content: Whenever this creature becomes tapped and it isn't attacking, blocking, or courageous, put a courage counter on it. As long as this creature has one or more courage counters on it, it is courageous.
{2}, {t}: Tap another target creature, then put a stun counter on it. Activate only as a sorcery.
~ gets +1/+0 for each courage counter on it.
